metadata.name: The Force #1/100
metadata.description:
Title: The Force  
Artist: PHLYimages I Phil de Glanville  
Edition/100

This liquid landscape was captured off the coast of Australia's South West at a surf break simply known as The Right.  Home to some of the heaviest waves on the planet, it only fires up a handful of times each year when the conditions perfectly align. This was one of those days - the ocean displaying its raw force, a powerful moment in time that will never occur again.



License: Primary NFT holder is free to use for private display and in groups including virtual galleries. Provides no rights for commercial use, merchandise, distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with creator.
